Posts.Content: Apr 1, 2017 07:04AM s57sunny wrote: I hate to disappoint anyone but I had my mastectomy 25 years ago and have had the itching off and on since then. Occasionally I would get lucky and find a place to scratch that helped relieve it but for the most part I have just had to wait it out.
Posts.Title: Will I ever stop itching? Held Moderators
